name: Shoot Run Cry Retreat
description:
I started working on this project for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam, but was not able to complete it within the 48 hours. So, I did the next best thing and finished it here and there. Took about 5 days. 

You stumble across an old factory town that has a few settlers held up for safety. Problem is that a horde of zombies have broken their defenses and you need to clear a few out for them. They will move the barricade once you have killed enough.

  • You can go to a supply spot and ask for help, but they may or may not give you what you need, or find any that are lying around. 
  • Kill enough zombies and look for the signal to move to the exit. 
  • Kill even more and you all might go crazy!!!
